text: It is fun events, good effort on kid performance. Kids manage to learn culture and love to participate.! We love it!
Had fun on Mid Autumn Day. Katherine loved Kinderland @ Padan Valley. She said she has the best teachers and she loves them very much!

My son is graduating from Kinderland Pandan Valley today. As a parent, I am extremely grateful to the teachers who have journeyed with us through the years; they have been patient, kind, nurturing and loving. The curriculum is robust and fun, with a good mix of indoor and outdoor activities. They played hard and yet, learnt well ! My son really enjoyed his pre-school years in Kinderland. Special thanks to Miss Connie,  Zhang Lao Shi, Miss Gretchen, Lin Lao Shi and Li Lao Shi and Miss Bernie for everything you all have done.

We can tell that the K2 Teachers at Kinderland pandan Valley  are caring and nurturing. Our child comes home and relates what his teacher said and taught him in class and is excited to attend school every day.  Great preschool with caring teachers!

Unfortunately, we had to move house so we had to withdraw him due to logistical reasons. But our son had been enrolled here since infant class up until playgroup. He has very warm and loving relationships with all the teachers. We all miss the positive experience we had with all the teaching staffs. Thank you Kinderland Pandan Valley for all the efforts and care you have provided our family :)
